title: New Zealand's Steve Hansen warns Joe Schmidt his side will be bringing new tricks to Ireland quarter-final clash
text:
New Zealand head coach, Steve Hansen, has warned his opposite number at Ireland, the meticulous planner that is Joe Schmidt, not to waste too much time studying the All Blacks as they might deliberately ‘set him up,’ by not revealing all that they intend to put into Saturday’s ‘do-or-die,’ quarter-final in Yokohama.

Even though Ireland have beaten New Zealand in two of their last three encounters, there have been rumblings about the effectiveness of Schmidt’s rigidity of his approach. Ireland have faded across the last nine months albeit rising to number one in the rankings at a certain...
description: New Zealand head coach, Steve Hansen, has warned his opposite number at Ireland, the meticulous planner that is Joe Schmidt, not to waste too much time studying the All Blacks as they might deliberately ‘set him up,’ by not revealing all that they intend to put into Saturday’s ‘do-or-die,’ quarter-final in Yokohama.
